title: SAMSUNG 230 L Direct Cool Single Door 3 Star Refrigerator  (Elegant Inox, RR24A2Y2YS8/NL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic, Glassware, Bulb, Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Digital Inverter Technology: This refrigerator comes with a Digital Inverter Compressor that automatically adapts its speed to meet the cooling requirements. This ensures energy efficiency coupled with long-lasting performance and almost noiseless operation.
product_description.Stabiliser-free Operation: Even without a stabiliser, this refrigerator can protect itself against voltage fluctuations. In case the voltage rises above the safe limit, it will automatically disconnect the power supply to prevent electrical damage.

review: Awesome product. Early delivery by flipkart but the delivery guy was very rude he was not ready for open box delivery apart from good experience. Worth every penny design and look wise quite impressive. Well done Samsung. Operation is very smooth and silent build quality is also very good. You can go for it without second thought you will not regret 🙂

I give 5 out of 5

WARNING!!! Guys don't get swayed away by it's classy design, yes it looks beautiful but the refrigerator is very bad. Too shaky, despite trying different ways.
Also, the main Reason I'm warning you against this is the Capacity of the fridge from inside and it's lame design due to which you'll literally find it very difficult to put things. The inside space is way too less than advertised because we had 180L LG refrigerator before this one and we literally were able to put more inside that old LG one than this larger refrigerator.
They have given more (unnecessary) space to the front door, than the internal and hence wasting lot of space. Also, it's build quality is not very strong.
I'm really disappointed by Samsung's Refrigerator (bought first time, will be last now). Our 15yr old LG refrigerator 180L was way better than this new model.
Just wanted to help others by sharing my review so that you also not get fooled by it's looks. Looks are deceptive :p
Awesome product ..mind blowing proformmance.. Thanks Flipkart 🤗

Very poor design from Samsung. Really disappointed with the performance. Reasons for the same are explained below:
1. Defrost takes a lot of time (as compared to Godrej which I was using earlier)
2. While defrosting the melted water drops spill all over the compartments. The collection tray doesn't do its job well.
3. User guide suggests to defrost twice a week. Its like more defrost than use. Practically we cannot keep family pack ice cream for regular consumption.
4. If someone doesn't follow the instructions as above, the frosts pile up in such a way that water storage compartment on the back may overflow. Its like do or die.
My Godrej refrigerator was way way better than this one.

I bought the fridge for my parents almost 2 months back. The fridge looks really good but the guys who came to deliver did not install it and left. When I called flipkart they told they do not have separate installation service available for this product which was “UNACCEPTABLE”. My senior citizen parents had to take help from someone else to get it fixed!

Now on the product, the fridge looks really good. But on the performance side, the first one month it worked fine however after that fridge seems to make a lot of sound, when on. Additionally, ice starts forming in the freezer and the tray below it and we have to defrost at least once a week. Not sure if it is meant to happen but surely not something you’ll expect these days...

Keep this in mind when you’re spending money on this product, should go for a frost free one..
